summary: Completed testing of CreditoIMO Iteration 6 - All requested features verified: Workflow Editor in Settings/Sistema tab, Admin Dashboard Users Tab with statistics and redirect, Kanban Trello badge code in place.

critical_code_review_comments: WorkflowEditor.js: Well-structured component with proper CRUD operations and toast notifications
SettingsPage.js: Sistema tab correctly conditionally rendered for admin users only
AdminDashboard.js: Users tab simplified with role statistics and redirect button
KanbanBoard.js: Trello badge correctly implemented with conditional rendering based on trello_card_id
admin.py: Workflow status endpoints properly implemented with validation and error handling
seed_data_creation: Created and deleted test workflow status 'TEST Estado de Teste' during UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Iteration 6 features are working correctly: 1) Workflow Editor in Settings/Sistema tab allows CRUD operations on workflow statuses with reordering, 2) Admin Dashboard Users Tab shows role statistics (Consultores, Intermediários, Diretores, Administrativos) and redirects to /utilizadores page, 3) Trello badge code is implemented in KanbanBoard.js and will display when processes have trello_card_id field populated (currently no processes have this field set as Trello integration is not yet active).

features: List all workflow statuses with order
Create new status with label, name, order, color, description
Edit existing status (label, order, color, description - name is readonly)
